PARAMETER.NAME: annotationName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the annotation to create, if blank (or null) the type of entity is used as the annotation name

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set in which new annotations will be created

PARAMETER.NAME: abnerMode
PARAMETER.COMMENT: This option allows tow different models to be used for tagging. Namely: NLPBA and BIOCREATIVE. NLPBA entity types are Gene, DNA, RNA, Cell Lines, Cell cultures. BIOCREATIVE entity type is Gene.

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process
